#summary A wiki page listing all qmmp packages



== Arch Linux ==

Arch Linux users can either choose to use the PKGBUILDs from AUR, or add the following repository for precompiled packages to their pacman.conf:

If you use the x86_64 Architecture
{{{
[dstr-repo]
Server = http://dimon.homeftp.org/repo/x86_64/
}}}
If you use the i686 Architecture
{{{
[dstr-repo]
Server = http://dimon.homeftp.org/repo/i686
}}}
